article: (10,l,10) ,,A, B, C, D. A calligrapher said to a man who was practicing calligraphy with waste newspapers, "If you write with the best paper, you may do it better." The man asked why. The calligrapher smiled without  _  , only writing one word "Compel ". He suddenly realized that this was compelling him to cherish his own paper to write it better.  _  a boy, when I practiced calligraphy, I would hear the teacher  _  it, but I felt it boring and couldn't understand. Looking back suddenly, I came to know its  _  . I remember there is  _  a proverb, " If you want to climb over a wall, please throw your hat  _  ." Because your hat is on the other side of the wall, you have already had no choice but to find ways to climb over it. It is with such a pressure that you will make every effort to exert  _  . Many times, we always put our  _  in the future, feeling that our life has many drafts . In fact, the drafts of life that  belong to  us are extremely limited. For life, the most important is  _  to write the best words on the limited paper rather than how much paper you used.
